snippet: The broader struggle will be over what some experts describe as Israel’s “creative” interpretation of international law for dealing with asymmetric warfare in an urban environment.
abstract: Fighting is barely over in latest Gaza war, but attention has shifted to legal battlefield as Israel gears up to defend itself against international allegations of possible war crimes in monthlong conflict; broader struggle will be over what some experts describe as Israel’s 'creative' interpretation of international law for dealing with asymmetric warfare in an urban environment.
lead_paragraph: The broader struggle will be over what some experts describe as Israel’s “creative” interpretation of international law for dealing with asymmetric warfare in an urban environment.

headline.main: Israel Braces for War Crimes Inquiries on Gaza
headline.print_headline: Israel Braces for War Crimes Inquiries on Gaza
